nodes.text: Uvide was a gambler's game of chance made popular in many high-end casinos throughout the galaxy. The focus of the game required players to bet on a number-specific outcome determined by a croupier spinning a pocketed device known as the uvide wheel.
There was a gaming parlor on the Queen of Empire where passengers could play uvide.
The game of uvide bore many similarities to the Earth-based casino game known as roulette.
